snippet.title: Soap Opera Dash - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready for fame, love triangles, and drama in Soap Opera Dash, PlayFirst's spoofiest time management game. Years of working on her script in Flo's Diner has finally paid off; Rosie the Regular gets her big break to produce her very own soap! Producing her show, As The Burger Turns, won't be easy... Help Rosie run everything on set, from casting the roles, styling the characters, and prepping the stage to produce the juiciest show in all of DinerTown!

    * Experience the zaniest soap opera parody around!
    * Encounter your favorite DinerTown characters as the show's actors and production crew
    * Prep the actors' hair, wardrobe, and makeup with fun mini-games
    * Handle everything behind-the-scenes, from delivering scripts, shooting the scenes and more
http://www.playfirst.com/game/soap-opera-dash?m=YTSOD
